name: CVE-2022-21778
description: In vpu, there is a possible information disclosure due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS06382421; Issue ID: ALPS06382421.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:google:android:10.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:google:android:11.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:google:android:12.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt6785:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt6779:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt6771:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt6853:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt6853t:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt6873:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt6877:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt6885:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt6891:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt6893:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8168:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8175:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8183:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8365:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8385:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8788:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]
